results.name: Decimal expansion of Sum_{n >= 2} (n/Product_{i >= 2} K(i)), where K(n) is the Kempner function A002034.
reference: I. Cojocaru, S. Cojocaru, The Third and Fourth Constants of Smarandache, Smarandache Notions Journal, Vol. 7, No. 1-2-3, 1996, 121-126.
link: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Smarandache Constants
